product_name: Trails Illustrated Pagosa Springs and Bayfield Area Trail Map
long_description: This Trails Illustrated folded map offers comprehensive coverage of Pagosa Springs and Bayfield in Colorado. Coverage includes San Juan National Forest, San Juan and Piedra rivers, Vallecito and Lemon reservoirs and Chimney Rock Archeological Area. Lists valuable wilderness tips and Leave No Trace guidelines, along with updated trails, trailheads, points of interest, campgrounds, and much more. Printed on waterproof, tear-resistant material with a plastic coating that offers supreme durability for your next outdoor adventure. Includes selected waypoints in both lat./lon. and UTM coordinate systems as well as GPS-compatible UTM grid lines for easy navigation. Measures 7.5 x 4 in. folded and 37.75 x 25.5 in. fully opened; scale of 1:63,360. National Geographic Maps; copyright 2008.
short_description: This Trails Illustrated folded map offers comprehensive coverage of Pagosa Springs and Bayfield in Colorado.
